task_instructions: fix test failures in FullClusterRestartSystemIndexCompatibilityIT where async search assertions fail intermittently
synthesized_task_instructions: The async search assertions in FullClusterRestartSystemIndexCompatibilityIT are failing intermittently because the search might not be complete when checked. Wrap the assertAsyncSearchHitCount calls with assertBusy to handle timing issues and add better error messages to help diagnose failures when they occur.
